name: At The Shoe Store
description:
A romantic old man, an office lady or a naughty kid? Who gets the shoes? You decide!

This visual novel was created in one week during the Army Of Me project for BHSAD Moscow.

Leader of the group:

  • Daria Lebesheva

Illustrators:

  • Ekaterina Vakulenko - Hortensia route
  • Lika Zakirova - Cash route
  • Lilia Gilfanutdinova - Akakiy route
